type: 1) home: the home page of the ontology that explains and provide access to its materials. It can be the landing page on the ontology registry portal. 2) git: the URL of the public git repository e.g., on GitHub. 3) issues: the URL of the issue maganagement of the ontology so that anyone can file an issue and track its status. <-->
